Package drcl.net

Interface Summary
PacketWrapper Packet wrapper interface.
PktClassifier Interface to implement a packet classifier.
 

Class Summary
Address Address implements an address scheme.
FooPacket A packet class that keeps both packet count and byte count.
Module A module is a component which implements a protocol.
Packet This class defines the base class for implementing packets.
 

Exception Summary
PacketException
